overview: Karalu Miriyalu is a romantic comedy with fantasy elements, In which, Michael Gambon who played the Dumbledore character in Harry Potter film is making his debut in a tollywood through this movie. The film deals with very common in every house that a husband or a wife may get angry on petty issues and pick up fights. But that doesnâ€™t mean that there is no love between the two due to these petty fights. The theme of the film is that where there is love there is pie fights.
title: Karalu Miriyalu
